attributes.action: Call a free Commons vote on invoking Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.additional_details: The British constitution requires the repeal of the European Communities Act 1972 in order to begin the country's separation from the European Union
attributes.background: In the wake of the so-called 'Brexit' vote, elected members of the British Parliament have a moral and legal duty to protect the interests of the United Kingdom and the economic well-being of the world at large. The time for political posturing and power-struggling has passed.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
